Careers

Are you looking for a challenge that will push your career beyond its limits? You enjoy a challenge? You have a thirst for knowledge and a desire to be one of the best?

At Al Safwan Marine, we draw on each other’s capacities and experiences, to inspire and motivate one another.

A diverse and talented team with a culture that promotes teamwork and an unwavering focus on serving our clients' best interests. Email your CVs to careers@alsafwanmarine.com

  • Technical Manager
    • Passed out from a reputed Institute in Mechanical/ Marine holding Diploma, Engineering or I T I degree with above 65% marks.
    • Aged between 28 – 38 years are allowed.
    • Minimum of 10 years of experience in the marine safety service industry.
    • Good knowledge required on both LSA and FFA division.
    • Preference will be provided to the candidates who had experienced in setting up a technical team earlier.
    • Should have good communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Basic computer knowledge is mandatory
    • Attractive salary with other benefits will be provided for the right candidate.
  • Sales Manager
    • Should have an MBA from a reputed institute.
    • Aged between 25 - 35 years are allowed.
    • Minimum of 5 years of sales experience in the marine safety service industry.
    • Should have an excellence in sales and negotiations skills.
    • Should have good communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Basic computer knowledge is mandatory.
    • Attractive salary with incentives will be provided for the right candidate.
  • Project Engineers
    • Passed out from a reputed Institute in Mechanical/ Marine holding Diploma, Engineering or I T I degree with above 65% marks.
    • Aged between 21 - 28 years are allowed.
    • Minimum of 5 years of experience in the marine safety service industry.
    • Good knowledge required either on LSA and FFA division.
    • Should have good communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Basic computer knowledge is mandatory.
    • Attractive salary with other benefits will be provided for the right candidate.
  • Service Engineers
    • Passed out from a reputed Institute in Mechanical/ Marine holding Diploma, Engineering or I T I degree with above 60% marks.
    • Aged between 21 - 28 years are allowed.
    • Minimum of 3 years of experience in the marine safety service industry.
    • Good knowledge required either on LSA and FFA division.
    • Should have good communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Basic computer knowledge is mandatory.
    • Attractive salary with other benefits will be provided for the right candidate.
